Andrzej Jan Taramina schrieb:
> 
> 
> Building on my prior post, has anyone worked through URL design and HTTP
> methods for situations where you are versioning resources?
> 
> Typically the versioning would be enforced on the back end, so that you 
> can't
> update a resource, only create a new version.
> 
> It's not clear to me whether Put or Post would be the better choice, or
> whether to allow both and make them identical in the versioning scenario?
> 
> My thought is that this should be a Post, since a new URL will be 
> created for
> the new versioned resource and that Put should not be allowed.
> 
> I'm thinking that the version information should be included in any 
> returned
> representation of the resource.
> 
> Any thoughts from the group?
> 
> Thx!

How about <http://www.webdav.org/specs/rfc3253.html>?

Best regards, Julian
